content: Crane maker Manitowoc Co Inc said it would spinoff its high-margin foodservice business into a publicly traded company  sending the company's shares up 8 percent in extended trading.

title: Crane maker Manitowoc to spin off foodservice business

content: Jan 29 Crane maker Manitowoc Co Inc said it would spinoff its high-margin foodservice business into a publicly traded company  sending the company's shares up 8 percent in extended trading.
name: Crane Company
title: Crane maker Manitowoc to spin off foodservice business
